data.title: Latest news, views, pictures, video
data.meta_description: Robin Williams, born in Chicago, shot to fame playing the alien 'Mork' in the TV series Mork & Mindy, and went on to establish a successful career in both stand-up comedy and feature film acting. His film credits include Good Morning Vietnam, Aladdin and Mrs Doubtfire.
